channel.title: Mints crashed
channel.description:
We've changed the gnome restaurant and associated shops in a few ways. Firstly, if you complete a delivery task, the food and cocktail ingredients shops will be restocked. Secondly, we've adjusted the rewards for the deliveries, so you're more likely to get better items such as mint cakes or seed pods.
LOL. It's funny how they were going for 10m the day before and no one will even buy them for minimum on ge now :eek: I feel sorry for all the idiots who traded their rares (disks, santas etc.) for mint cakes. !!!!!!@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ p.s. I heard that you can get up to 20 mints as a reward from the gnome game.

item.title: Mints crashed
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Yeah, I had a laugh about it. Maybe it’ll teach people a lesson for fixing prices, which is what most of the people in the rares market do (they refuse to sell the items at the GE value and instead use their hyper-inflated ‘street prices’).

Read full topic

item.title: Mints crashed
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

Mopman:

This is the JaGex way of fixing a bug.

It’s not fixing a bug, it’s just preventing an element of a bug from occurring ;]
